   <meta content="Capriccio can provide a high quality string quartet trio duo to play beautiful classical pop jazz or traditional music for weddings civil partnerships receptions corporate functions throughout Scotland." name="Description"/>

    <div class="cc03" id="e15">
     <div>
      <font size="4">
       CAPRICCIO
       <u>
        <strong>
         string quartet
        </strong>
       </u>
       has been performing music for
       <u>
        <strong>
         wedding ceremonies
        </strong>
       </u>
       (religious, civil, humanist etc.),
       <u>
        <strong>
         receptions
        </strong>
       </u>
       ,
      </font>
     </div>
     <div>
      <font size="4">
       <u>
        <strong>
         civil partnerships
        </strong>
       </u>
       ,
       <u>
        <strong>
         corporate  
 		functions
        </strong>
       </u>
       in
       <u>
        <strong>
         Scotland
        </strong>
       </u>
       and elsewhere since 1985.
      </font>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cc03" id="e14">
     <div>
      <font size="4">
       The
       <u>
        <strong>
         string quartet
        </strong>
       </u>
       has performed in a wide range of venues, both
      </font>
     </div>
     <div>
      <font size="4">
       in Edinburgh (e.g. Holyrood Palace, Scottish Parliament,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       Royal  
 		Museum of Scotland,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       Edinburgh Castle
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       , Signet Library, Norton House Hotel, Balmoral Hotel,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       The Assembly Rooms, Old College Library,  
 		Signet Library) and also as
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       far afield as Greywalls Hotel,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       Balbirnie House Hotel, Mar Hall,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       Gleneagles
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       ,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       Turnberry
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       , St. Andrews,  
 		Aberdeen, Aviemore,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       Stirling Castle,
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       Dirleton Castle, Wedderburn Castle, Duns Castle, Cameron House Hotel and Liverpool.
      </font>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cc03" id="e13">
     <font size="4">
      <strong>
       CAPRICCIO FLUTE QUARTET
      </strong>
      (flute, violin, viola and cello) is an alternative ensemble to the string quartet.
     </font>
    </div>
    <div class="cc03" id="e12">
     <font size="4">
      <strong>
       CAPRICCIO BAROQUE
      </strong>
      consists of two violins, cello and harpsichord. They play music by well-known composers such as Bach, Handel and  
 		Vivaldi, and also 18th century Scottish composers. They also perform as a trio (2 violins &amp; cello; OR flute, violin &amp; cello;  
 		OR 2 violins and harpsichord; OR flute, violin &amp; harpsichord) or as a six-piece group with the addition of flute and viola.
     </font>
    </div>
    <div class="cc03" id="e11">
     <font size="4">
      <strong>
       CAPRICCIETTO PIANO TRIO
      </strong>
      has a similar repertoire to that of CAPRICCIO STRING QUARTET. They require a venue with a piano or can provide  
 		a good electric piano.
     </font>
    </div>
    <div class="cc03" id="e10">
     <font size="4">
      <strong>
       CAPRICCIETTO STRING TRIO
      </strong>
      consists of two violins and cello and can offer a repertoire similar to that of the string quartet
     </font>
    </div>

       <strong>
        Professional musicians for your wedding (religious, civil, humanist etc.) or civil partnership ceremony / reception in Scotland.
       </strong>
      </font>
     </div>
     <div>
      <font color="#800000">
       <strong>
        String  
 		quartet, trio, duo, solo instrumentalists and larger ensembles.
